Author: taoshka
Text: Ugh having a parent with an ED sucks! My mom is 3 inches taller than me, but her Lw is 12lbs lower than mine,and she had the tiniest waist ever :/

Author: stripteas
Text: I feel this so bad. My mom has also had an ED my whole life and has always wanted to be a certian number and Ive always felt like, mad at her for not being ok with food and passing this on to me and also being the same height and making me feel like that weight is THE IDEAL. And of course now my ideal is 10lbs less than that. I hope to one day break this cycle and raise my kids knowing theyre perfect at any number.
